name: Wasen Daybed
description: Initially designed for a faithful client, the Wasen daybed truly expresses Liaigre's spirit, at the crossroads between classicism and modernity. Its sober, moderate design makes it easy to match and combine with other pieces to fit all configurations and ambiances perfectly. Its apparent simplicity and elegance make this new daybed one of our iconic models. The comfort of the chair invites you to rest, read and dream. It can be upholstered in fabric or leather and has a walnut or oak veneer base.
